data.title: Frndly TV Channels List: What Channels Are on Frndly TV?
data.meta_description: What channels does Frndly TV have? Here's the complete Frndly TV channel list with a breakdown of the different subscription packages.
data.text:
Frndly TV is an affordable, family-friendly television streaming option that includes the Hallmark Channel, the Weather Channel, and several other popular TV channels.

We published a complete review of Frndly TV if you’re interested in learning more about the unique features, pricing, plans and bundle deals.

Check out our free TV guide so you can see what’s currently airing on Frndly TV’s 40+ channels.

Frndly TV’s subscription package breakdown

Frndly TV currently offers three different subscription package tiers: Basic, Classic and Premium. The live TV channels and on-demand selection are the same with all 3 packages, but differ in terms of video quality, number of simultaneous streams, and DVR recording capability.

The Basic package includes SD video quality and only 1 person can stream at a time.

The Classic plan includes HD video quality, 2 simultaneous streams, unlimited DVR recordings, and the ability to save your DVR recordings for up to three months.

Finally, the Premium plan includes HD video quality, 4 simultaneous streams, unlimited DVR, and the ability to save your recordings for up to 9 months.

All plans offer the option to sign up for the whole year and save upwards of 15%.

Complete Frndly TV channel list

As of this writing, Frndly TV currently offers 40+ channels with all 3 plans. Below is a complete list of every channel on Frndly.

Can you add channels to Frndly TV?

Beginning October 1, 2021, Frndly TV began offering Hallmark Movies Now as an add-on subscription option. Hallmark Channel, Hallmark Movies & Mysteries, and Hallmark Drama are all part of the Frndly TV lineup, so this addition makes a lot of sense for its subscribers. For an additional $5.99/month, Friendly TV subscribers can watch Hallmark Movies Now, too.

Some of the most popular titles on Hallmark Movies Now include Heartland, My Sister’s Keeper, The Good Witch movies, and Chesapeake Shores.

More recent additions to the Frndly TV lineup are Crime+Investigation, GRIT, and ion.

Does Frndly TV offer local channels?

Not at this time. As of this writing, Frndly TV does not offer sports, news or local channels. There are a few channels like the Sportsman Channel and World Fishing Network that can help you get your fix of that type of content. Plus, Frndly TV has been adding new channels to their platform more rapidly in the past year, so this may change in the future.

How can I watch Frndly TV?

Frndly TV’s supported devices include the following:

Computer: Web browsers

Mobile: Android, iOS

Streaming: Apple TV, Chromecast, Fire TV, Roku

TVs: Android TV

Can I try Frndly TV before I sign up?

Yes! Frndly TV offers a 7-day free trial on all 3 plans, so you can try it out before you pay. Additionally, all the plans have no commitments and you pay month-to-month, so you can cancel anytime unless you've signed up for a year.
